description:
In order to defeat Rokkaku Shotei, Hideyoshi, Sakuma, and Tanba attack Mitsukuri Castle. Rokkaku was convinced that they would try to attack Wadayama Castle that was on the front lines. Despite being attacked, the men at Mitsukuri Castle do what they can to fight back. It’s then that Takenaka Hanbee comes up with a new strategy...
Source: crunchyroll
